title: Glenn Williams, VP and Group Editor, MDedge

sections.heading: Overview
content: Glenn Williams, VP, Group Editor at MDedge.

Williams started in medical publishing in 1990 and has been with it ever since. In that time he has handled peer-review journals as well as news publications. Specialties covered include primary care, anesthesiology, orthopedics, pulmonary medicine, psychiatry, and neurology. He has been with the news publication Neurology Reviews since 1995. He is currently the editor of Neurology Reviews and Pediatric News (in print) and MDedge Neurology and MDedge Pediatrics (online).
